thread.title: Natalie Robinette Huffard
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Natalie Robinette Huffard

author: Natalie Robinette Huffard
title: Natalie Robinette Huffard
text: I ordered t-shirts for the 8th grade girls on the basketball team. They looked great & came in a couple of days. One shrunk way too much, but I spoke with Alexis, and she hooked me right up with another one in a larger size. It could not have been easier or more pleasant.
